comment: St Marks powder plant. ... Looks like they were ground zero for hurricane Michael. Never been there but hope their structures handled it. St Marks is one of the two modern smokeless power mills in the USA. That's right only supplying all domestic production, for military&commercial ammo, and reloading. Any one have any news? This could effect prices!
amr:
# ::snt St Marks powder plant. ... Looks like they were ground zero for hurricane Michael. Never been there but hope their structures handled it. St Marks is one of the two modern smokeless power mills in the USA. That's right only supplying all domestic production, for military&commercial ammo, and reloading. Any one have any news? This could effect prices!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / plant
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "St"
                  :op2 "Marks")
            :ARG0-of (p2 / powder-01))
      :snt2 (l / look-02
            :ARG1 (g / ground
                  :mod (z / zero)
                  :location-of (h / hurricane
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Michael"))))
      :snt3 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (b / be-located-at-91
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (ii / i)
                  :ARG2 (t / there)
                  :time (e / ever))
            :ARG2 (h2 / hope-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (h3 / handle-01
                        :ARG0 (s / structure
                              :poss (t2 / they))
                        :ARG1 (ii2 / it))))
      :snt4 (ii3 / include-91
            :ARG1 (m2 / mill
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "St"
                        :op2 "Marks"))
            :ARG2 (m3 / mill
                  :quant 2
                  :mod (p3 / power)
                  :ARG1-of (m4 / modern-02)
                  :location (c2 / country
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "USA"))))
      :snt5 (r / right-06
            :ARG1 (t3 / that)
            :ARG2 (s2 / supply-01
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (p4 / produce-01
                              :mod (d / domestic)
                              :mod (a2 / all))
                        :op2 (a3 / ammo
                              :mod (m5 / military)
                              :mod (c3 / commerce))
                        :op3 (r2 / reload-01))
                  :mod (o / only)))
      :snt6 (h4 / have-03
            :ARG0 (a4 / anyone)
            :ARG1 (n5 / news
                  :mod (a5 / any))
            :polarity (a6 / amr-unknown))
      :snt7 (p5 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (a7 / affect-01
                  :ARG0 (t4 / this)
                  :ARG1 (p6 / price-01))))
